Hi there! I'm Jillian.

I’m a student at UC Berkeley, studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) + Business Administration in the M.E.T. Program. This past summer, I was an AI & Data Science Intern at J.P. Morgan Chase, where I worked on an macroeconomic modeling team to build a LLM-powered summarization model and enhance the complexity of a predictive international GDP model, and previously worked at Disney Streaming as a Data Science intern.

I’m currently looking for full time roles in machine learning, data science, or software engineering. Feel free to contact me anytime!
